title: How to Draw In a Crowd

steps.headline: Stop thinking that this has got to do something with your destiny and stuff like that.

text: Stop thinking that this has got to do something with your destiny and stuff like that. It's all in your own hands. Wear a smile to the crowd, even if you don't know anybody. Remember smile attracts more people towards you. Dress well. Be confident and wear your good attitude. It's like selling yourself to the crowd where everyone is bidding for you. Make yourself sellable. When people talk, talk the way they want and not the way you want. Speak what they want to hear, not what you want to speak. Judge the people/group quickly asap, and then open up. Rather than you opening up and giving them an image about you. Ask/lead the group to more depth. Ask them about a dinner/coffee/walk/party. Remember first meeting is not the last one. Leave things for the next time too. Follow the steps with different groups, soon you will have choice to decide which group you want to hangout on Friday's.  Live the LIFE you've imagined.
